text:
Trending on Billboard

A Halloween party without a good Latin song is just nothing! And for that reason Ellen DeGeneres — who always supports Spanish-language music — invited the artist behind the latest Latin hit on U.S. radio, J Balvin, to heat up her audience during a Halloween episode of The Ellen DeGeneres Show.

On Tuesday (Oct. 31), the Colombian superstar appeared (for the first time) on Ellen to perform live “Mi Gente,” with a band dressed up in the same style as him, turning the TV studio into a big party where everybody — including pregnant Karla Kardashian, Ellen’s costume — dance from beginning to end.

“Mi Gente” currently leads Billboard’s Hot Latin Songs chart, and following the release of the Beyoncé collab version, it also peaked at No. 3 on the Billboard Hot 100 (chart dated Oct. 21).

See Balvin performing “Mi Gente”:
title: J Balvin Gets the Halloween Party Started With ‘Mi Gente’ on ‘Ellen’: Watch
